website_summaries.verdict: With 2 separate compartments, this mop bucket is perfect for rinsing after you clean. Works best with sponge mops.
pros: Dual compartments deliver great versatility and can be used for your floor cleaning solution and clean water or for carrying other cleaning supplies
Fits most sponge mops and squeegees
Pouring lip makes for easier emptying
Sturdy, compact, and easy to store
cons: The narrow rectangular compartments limit mop head compatibility

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Quality
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other comments. I had the same mop head for more than a decade and it worked well. These replacement heads are inferior, by far. As others have stated, they DO NOT stay in place and split within a few weeks of use. I used to be a Mfrs.' Rep. for Rubbermaid Commercial Products in the Metro NY market. They used to produce a product that was unsurpassed, evidently that's no longer the case.
customer_reviews.author: musiqman

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL FOR RUBBERMAID COMMERCIAL MOP HEADS!!!
customer_reviews.text: this bucket is listed as part of the "Commercial" line, yet none of the Commercial line mop heads will fit into it. They're maybe an inch or so too big. In fact there is no bucket made by Rubbermaid that will fit their own Commercial mops. Pretty pathetic, I say. If you don't expect to use it as a Commercial line mop bucket, it's well made, sturdy and has a decent handle. Be careful when the two sides have different amounts of liquid in them though--it gets unbalanced easily.
customer_reviews.author: mabg

customer_reviews.title: mop
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of minimal use in our home the mop broke. Where the handle rinse bracket meets with sponges will no longer make the connection. I can't find the problem and the mop was taken very good care of. In addition I purchased a backup sponge/mop unit but won't need that now as the entire unit is probably going into the garbage.I always looked at the brand being high quality but after this experience I'm not so sure.
customer_reviews.author: david a

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size to fit my mop head and squeegee implement
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality, heavy duty commercial bucket that is perfect for use in my residential cleaning business. I really like the double sides, which helps me separate the cleaning bottles from the cleaning towels and implements. When I need to use the bucket for mopping, I can use one side for the soapy water and one side to rinse. The lip allows the water to drain neatly when I'm emptying the bucket. The size is wide and deep enough to allow my flat head mop and my window washing implement to fit nicely. I highly recommend this bucket for commercial as well as residential use.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sponge mops
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I wanted a bucket that was wide enough for a sponge mop and I ran across this bucket that has two compartments; I use one for clean water and the other to wring out the dirty water. Easy to carry and fits my mop perfectly. So glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: First one liquified after about a month; was very careful about wringing it out and leaving it to dry. Replacement head fell apart the first time I used it. Sponge popped right out. No returns on this item so I contacted Rubbermaid directly; no response. It's been 2 weeks. Bought a whole new handle and heads from another company and this one's going in the trash. Huge waste of time and money. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: casiel

customer_reviews.title: Back breaker.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mop hoping it would be truly “professional” grade. In reality it’s the same or less quality as your standard mop from Target. Build quality aside, my #1 complaint is how short this mop is. Pictures make it seem like it’s much longer. Being a tall dude, I’m forced to arch my back forward to mop with this thing. Instant back ache. Used once then tossed in the garage. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Mop Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this mop three times, and every time it broke quickly. In fact, the second one arrived broken. The first mop worked for three cleanings and then broke. The mop head became separated from the thing that holds it, and was not reparable. The second mop I ordered a couple months later and it arrived with the handle bent in the middle so it could not be put together. The third mop broke within a couple minutes of touching the floor, again the mop head became separated from the thing that holds the head. This is with normal light use. This is a bad mop!
customer_reviews.author: jayk

customer_reviews.title: This is what is wrong with out nations products
customer_reviews.text: The mophead was damp was I received it. I should have not kept it but thought it would be okay. It is horrible and looks like it was returned and repackaged without even looking.. i only mop my wood floors once a week. We live in a brand new house so I did not abuse this but am even to replace with the horror stories about the replacement heads. Not Happy. Made in CHINA
customer_reviews.author: Slo/mo

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The mop head will not stay on falls off the mop the instant it touches the floor.It can't wring the mop head because the mop is so cheap that the metal just bends it can't put enough pressure on the mop head.It also pops out of it's locked in position and into it's mop head release position.I do like the sponge in the mop head but it's useless in this mop.
customer_reviews.author: fmcon

customer_reviews.title: A Rubbermaid Classic. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This good old fashioned sponge mop does exactly what I need it to do and it does it really well. It is easy to handle, cleans spills and floors very effectively and it is easy to clean after use. I have tried a few new mops with many features and promises, but I have been underwhelmed. This classic works for me and the value is great!
customer_reviews.author: PLC

customer_reviews.title: It broke after using it 5 times.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mop to replace one like it I had purchased somewhere else. The value was good so I bought it. I've used it maybe 5 times since I bought it on February 25. Today, when I went to use it, the sponge came out of the metal holder that keeps it together and makes it a mop so you can wring it out. My window to return this item closed about a month ago and fortunately I got a 2nd mop head so I will put that on and see how long that one lasts. I had found this mop on another site for 3 times the money, guess I should've gotten it from them.
customer_reviews.author: Elkofolks

customer_reviews.title: Utter piece of JUNK!!! Lasted 1 hour
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mop in history. Wanted it to clean the back porch. 1/4 done and it fell apart. NO WAY to fix it. The flaw is in the mop head and the ringer. Once it gets wet when you ring it the sponge pulls out. DONE. Buy any mop other than this junk!! JUNK!! Wasted my money. Yeah I am mad.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbabanjo

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: My mother wanted a sponge mop, and I was hesitant because I know how difficult the mop head can be to squeeze out. (My mom is 80, and doesn’t have much hand strength any longer). I got this for her and was pleasantly surprised by the ease of use, the sturdiness, the lightweight feel of the mop and, most importantly, how simple it is and how little effort it takes to drain the mop head. My mom can push down a lever, pull it back up, and she’s done. It’s important to her to keep doing things for herself as long as possible, and as sappy as it may sound, this mop is a great help!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: A good idea, poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: As others have reported, the sponge part of the mophead quickly pulls out of the U-shaped metal bracket, and once this happens, flush $15 down the toilet. This one lasted about 15 minutes, or three or four squeezes. Unacceptable for even a household product, let alone a commercial mop that costs $35!!!!
customer_reviews.author: StraightShooter

customer_reviews.title: The best bucket ever.
customer_reviews.text: This double bucket is the best. This is the 3rd one I have purchased over the years. Don,t know what my husband did with the last one. My house is 2500 sq feet saltio tile and this baby makes cleaning the floors so much easier. Highly recommend. It is a great size for sponge mops as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!! WELL WORTH THE MONEY - EVERY PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was recently diagnosed with leukemia. We have been married 43 yrs. - I have NEVER washed the floors or did housework. I said to myself.. How can you really wash floors with 1 bucket - Cleaner - water - rinse - Made no sense to me. I said I need a 2 partition bucket to do this right.. So I purchased this one - PERFECT - I was right...
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Mophead does not stay in the mounting at all. ...
customer_reviews.text: Mophead does not stay in the mounting at all. I have to hold onto the lever the whole time I use it. It was not clear from the description, but, the mop handle comes in two sections, when put together it is very loose and rattles. Very short mop handle too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: I like the larger size
customer_reviews.text: I've had the single bucket and cheaper double version for years. I like the larger size, but the negative is that when carrying these while filled they tend to tip as the water sways forward and back. Rubbermaid could've come up with something better in the handle rather than a single pivot point. For that reason I often reach for the single or square bucket for most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: W. Barry

customer_reviews.title: Hopeless piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: The release handle that's made to squeeze the mop head? Doesn't work at all. All it does is jam up, then it just drops the mop head. Complete piece of crap. I threw it away. Will not waste my money on this brand any more.
customer_reviews.author: Terrils

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't balance when carried by handle!
customer_reviews.text: When picked up by handle, bucket is out of balance and tips either to front or back. Will not self balance, have to balance by hand or water would spill out. Everything looks good, can't see why it is doing this.
customer_reviews.author: spence

customer_reviews.title: A really lovely grey, and super sturdy. Uses less water.
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is a nice, large capacity. With the narrow compartments, I use less water than I did with my other bucket, plus, there is a wide pour spout so emptying the bucket is very easy and there are no spills.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: 2 Reservoirs Makes a Difference
customer_reviews.text: Being able to rinse out the mop before putting it back in the cleaning solution makes such a difference. The only downside is the extra weight, but the bucket and handle are sturdy enough to carry the load. I fill each side less than half way, because I don't feel like I need as much water, since it stays cleaner. I may add a sturdy plant caddy so I can roll it around.
customer_reviews.author: Aramat

customer_reviews.title: health related bucket
customer_reviews.text: I saw a divided pile used for cleaning. I wanted to used this type of pile to soak my feet. This bucket turned out to be a bit too deep. I was able to soak the feet and it was very relaxing and healthful with Epsom salt. I can handle the depth with care.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clean and rinse! Sturdy and strong bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Keeps my mop clean. Hey! Don't fill it to the top. Duh. And you will end up with more water on the rinse side. Takes some strength to carry two gallons of water carefully. Duh again.
customer_reviews.author: Janetinabasket

customer_reviews.title: lasts only a few uses due to faulty design
customer_reviews.text: As was the case for others, my mop head pulled apart after only a few uses. It is a faulty design because the plastic head for the sponge is only slightly indented into the sponge so that when the sponge shrinks slightly and is squeezed out, it pulls the sponge out of the plastic sponge head. This would be very easy for the manufacturer to correct.
customer_reviews.author: rdxew

customer_reviews.title: But I like the mop handle and was really frustrated about throwing ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should, finally. We had several - 4 or 5 - of these mop heads pull apart, even after complaining and receiving a couple directly from Rubbermaid. But I like the mop handle and was really frustrated about throwing it out, so I tried one more order. It's been about two months now, with weekly use, and this one has held up just fine. Nothing special about it, but it is doing what it is supposed to do without pulling apart. Hopefully, they have fixed the problem. But I am not ready to declare it fixed until I have one or two more without problems.
customer_reviews.author: Harth Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I have used a Rubbermaid mop for years this one broke in one week I have tried to fix it but the handle still comes apart if possible to use
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Floored
customer_reviews.text: ...my "go to" pail for floors....one side cleaner, other side rinse water. I would have liked a way to release rinse water, while retaining the other side. Wheels would also be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Green

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DESIGN AT IT'S ABSOLUTE WORST !!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing positive I can say, is that it didn't fail out of the box, just the first time I used it. See my photo on this one. (I guess no photos can be uploaded) The thing just came apart FAIL Do they even test this product at all ?
customer_reviews.author: Electric Fred

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I tried to use the wringer!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the handle was a pain to put together, but I got it. Then I soaked the mop for a quite a while because there was a warning about wringing a dry mop. I mopped 5 swipes on the floor and dipped the mop into the rinse water. The sponge popped off the roller and the handle came off as I tried to wring it. I completed the return for the mop, but the unopened refill was not returnable. Don't buy this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for multiple jobs
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I did not like about the product in that you have to make sure to have the same levels in each side. Overall a very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cora Miller

customer_reviews.title: 2 not 12
customer_reviews.text: Only two mop heads arrive, not twelve! Please correct the information!
customer_reviews.author: K. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Very sad and disapointed
customer_reviews.text: The mop works really good when it does not break completly when it is rung out...I had good luck in the past with this mop head, 2 previous to this one broke probally with in 2 weeks or 4 times using them...this one I just bought broke first time I run out the water...i’m very disapointed to say the least..wish I could get all my money back for this one and the other 2 or 3 that have done the same thing in a very short time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen stenz

customer_reviews.title: Broke instantly  --right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I detached the sponge to remove the plastic wrapper; the sponge then fell of the frame and I couldn't replace it. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. DeFanti Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket. Holds a lot. We filled the compartments with cleaning supplies. This makes it easy to grab and go when needed for our housing program.
customer_reviews.author: A. P.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my everyday cleaning needs to carry my products from room to room
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far but caution not to overfill as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far but caution not to overfill as the handle will try to pull the two sides apart while picking it up.
customer_reviews.author: ITrackM

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: great large sturdy divided bucket. Perfect exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: C Pop and you don't stop

customer_reviews.title: Mop Head Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The mop itself it of good quality, however the mop head is made of something that does not rinse out easily and it falls apart. Rubbermaid needs to figure out how to resolve this!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice M.

customer_reviews.title: You'll love this!
customer_reviews.text: It is absolutely perfect. I use one side for the soapy water and the other side to clean off the dirt before I reuse the soapy water to really clean things. It is bigger than I expected which is a real plus!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Joy Proman

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, but expect some cross-contamination of water.
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying this bucket for mopping, then be aware that when you wring the mop, it will not be possible to wring the mop just into one of the pail chambers. Thus, even if you start with one chamber full of soapy water and the other with only water for rinsing, they will eventually both contain some amount of soapy, dirty water. Still, the price is quite reasonable, which gives it a one star bump.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G.

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a man’s mob not that sloppy raggedy stuff
customer_reviews.author: Dane Adams

customer_reviews.title: Use a “Hammer” to Tap the Handle for Attachmment.
customer_reviews.text: Today June 4 2020 just received my sponge mop delivered by Amazon. The sponge is durable, but you need to soak the sponge in a bucket of water for 45 minutes to soften before mopping. My only dissatisfaction is the handle. Box arrived with sponge attached to bottom portion, handle not attached. I had to use a “hammer” to tap the handle in the top slot.
customer_reviews.author: ALESIA HOWARDALL

customer_reviews.title: Mop Head completely separated.
customer_reviews.text: Mop head did not survive one wringing. Sponge completely separated from the metal carrier.
customer_reviews.author: WM

customer_reviews.title: A great scrub bucket
customer_reviews.text: Finally a container to fit my mop with rinse and wash together. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Unique Finder

customer_reviews.title: This is a worthless piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: It takes superhuman strength to work the mop wring function and after the third time of use it would no longer work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I like this alot
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I anticipated and more roomier than I thought. Very handy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A Tai

customer_reviews.title: Not a cheap bucket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for house cleaning and wide enough for 14 inch mop head, Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stinehelfer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a bucket.. It does bucket things well... Sturdy bucket.
customer_reviews.author: sharon kate albin

customer_reviews.title: Mop head failed
customer_reviews.text: the cellulose sponge pulled out of the metal frame after less than a dozen uses despite heeding warnings about wringing out only when wet. the components are made of durable materials, but the system does not work as described.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great value, last a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Works great holds a lot of products very durable...it will last forever
customer_reviews.author: DEBORA WEISS

customer_reviews.title: I was annoyed enough to wait 2 years to order another refill
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mop handle 3 or 4 years ago. It came with one mop head refill. I used it for about two weeks before the sponge became detached from the metal strip. I was annoyed enough to wait 2 years to order another refill. I ordered 2 this time. Used the first shortly after they arrived. Used it again aabout a week later. Sure enough, the sponge detached from the metal strip. Seems like the product should be made better!!!! Not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: do-it-yourselfer

customer_reviews.title: Sponge mop head will only last around five months before starting to disintegrate
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaint as to the mop. However, the the sponge mop head will only last around five months before starting to disintegrate.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M. Corpus

customer_reviews.title: Rubbermaid FG262800 19-Quart Double Pail, 18" Length x 14.5" Width x 10"...
customer_reviews.text: Really a great pail. Why you may ask makes this different than any other is that this has two, that's right two reservoirs for water. One for clean water and the other to wring out the dirty water. Why clean your floors with a single reservoir pail only to end up cleaning with dirty water.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ressler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Three people tried in vain to assemble it, including one man; the pieces simply did not fit together.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Well it's well built and it's a great idea. However my wife says it's too heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Well it's well built and it's a great idea. However my wife says it's too heavy when it's half full.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a regular bucket, especially for large pro sponge mop.
customer_reviews.text: Very good bucket for a large sponge mop. Very wide to allow use of a large pro sponge mop. Two chambers allow a soap mix on one side and just water on the other side for rinse. Chambers are a good size but not overly large, filling about 2/3 full allows easy carry, a non-sectioned bucket would be much more heavy. Handle is good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gledhill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This proved to be a very good bucket for long narrow mop heads...
customer_reviews.author: warren russell

customer_reviews.title: I like the mop
customer_reviews.text: I had a mop from the state fair I used for about 30 years. I have never been able to find one equal to that one. Time to look for a new mop and I found this one. I have hardwood floors,it does an awsome job. The head is very good quality. The handle works loose and comes apart.I will put a clamp on as sudgested in another comment.The ringer handle does flip the other way at times also. The way the head attaches is like my old mop and it works very well. This is the closest mop to my old one I have found in about 12 years. all in all a good mop,problems are miner.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This replacement fit perfectly but only last a few mopping. The sponge detached and also shrunk.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This mop head only lasted about 2 months - with very light use. The sponge separated from the metal frame. There isn't another refill option for the mop handle so am now looking to replace the whole thing. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Loraidh

customer_reviews.title: Generally well made
customer_reviews.text: Will hold about a dozen different cleaners, plus duster, brushes, etc without breaking the handle or bending.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kolton

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and well made bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and well made bucket! We use if for our window washing project, but is useful for any type of project. You can keep clean water in one side or not.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieQzzz

customer_reviews.title: Very good, not great
customer_reviews.text: A 14 inch squeegee fits perfectly in this Rubbermaid Commercial 19-Quart Double Pail. The product appears both sturdy and well made. A pouring lip is provided at one end only. I would prefer a lip at each end.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this double pail. very sturdy and perfect for my need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Sponge fell out of the metal track the first time I used it. Hooray, this thing sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: the sponge mop comes loose from its own metal housing then flops around . poor design, dont waist your money . Im here looking for a way to get a refund . since it failed the 2nd and 3rd time i used it .
customer_reviews.author: mike menichetti

customer_reviews.title: This double pail is great ecause one side is for the dirty water and ...
customer_reviews.text: This double pail is great ecause one side is for the dirty water and other has clean water. It's great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Francine F.

customer_reviews.title: This mop head is horrible
customer_reviews.text: Both mop heads I purchased fell off the metal top attachment on the first use! So frustrating, now I'm left with a useless mop handle as I will not be purchasing another replacement mop head from them!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy J Ridge

customer_reviews.title: this mop broke within its first use. I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: this mop broke within its first use. I couldn't be bothered to try to repackage it so did not send it back. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Sargent

customer_reviews.title: I've used one mop head a few times and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used one mop head a few times and it broke. I put the second one on today, mopped the floor once and when I went to mop with clean water it broke. These mop heads do not last, the sponge part separated from the metal piece that attached to the mop. I now have 2 giant sponges and no mop!
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: NOT a 12-pack, as stated
customer_reviews.text: The screenshot shows that the mop head refills are sold as a 12-pack. I only received one refill, not twelve. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Quakereader

customer_reviews.title: sponge works - don't last
customer_reviews.text: when sponge comes un crimped it cannot be re crimped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and absorbent ! Fits mop with the hook through loop in the middle, just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Husted

customer_reviews.title: If you need a double-sided bucket, this is a good one
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket. A little bigger than my old one but is of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does not come with a handle even though it says it does
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this mop and it came without a handle. So basically it’s useless. Why would you say it comes with a handle when it doesn’t. DO NOT BUY!! It’s a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Michelle M. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for wider mop heads
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it should do, and it does it well. There's plenty of room to rinse your mop head, and having two compartments, one for your cleaning liquid and the other for rinsing, is helpful. This pail by Rubbermaid well-made, and I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Interesting bucket. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a mop bucket. Built nice like most Rubbermaid products. Like being able to clean my floors with clean rinse water. Without having to empty and refill the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Non functioning product.
customer_reviews.text: Mop head continually pops out of the mop head holder. How is this considered a commercial product? It can not even function in a small household situation. Frustrated that I wasted money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: George Bieber

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Totally eliminates a two bucket system - buy the matching Rubbermaid commercial roller mop that fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Rhinin

customer_reviews.title: Mop Bucket Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is another good Rubbermaid product. I ordered a dolly also so I can make short work of my floors.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: Bait and switch. Says pack of 12 but only one delivered
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: You will have to work on the mop head
customer_reviews.text: Like the other complaints the mop head separated. I had to force it back together and squeeze it tightly in a vice. Now it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: S Sours

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I love having the two sides
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I love having the two sides. Its a little big and bulky and I have trouble fitting it in my sink.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: It's terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I like to use a double bucket, so I can keep the clean or soapy water on one side and the dirty water on the other. The bucket is long enough to accommodate a sponge mop. It is a heavy duty bucket and I'm sure it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: So if you take the recommendation you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Caution. Within the "frequently bought together" section for this item the Rubbermaid fgg78112 refill is listed. It does not fit the same mop handle as this item. So if you take the recommendation you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mop head fell apart the second time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this replacement mop head before, but this one fell apart the second time I used it. I've contacted Rubbermaid and am waiting for their response.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Mop sponge comes off
customer_reviews.text: The mop sponge fell off during the first use. I cannot recommend this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin T Arai

customer_reviews.title: I like the Divider
customer_reviews.text: It is not to big; I like the Divider. Very glad I bought this Rubbermaid commercial.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lemaire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pail
customer_reviews.text: This pail is big. Does not look it in the picture but it is so it's great for mopping. Just fill one side with soap and water and the other side with clean water for rinsing and you can mop in one step.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sisombath

customer_reviews.title: Double bucket
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to find a good double bucket anywhere! Yeah! Amazon carries it! Works great and is very large and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Barker

customer_reviews.title: great mop
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my beauty shop and home, if you rinse it out often as you clean it will not leave streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: super sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bucket! Fits everything I need to take from room to room to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Taresa M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Buy a swiffer
customer_reviews.text: I liked the handle, but the sponge only lasted 3 weeks before detaching from the binding. Flimsy design from otherwise decent brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Replacement used in my current mop. Due to other reviews dh tightened the hold the metal has on the sponge before we began using it.
customer_reviews.author: Boy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So easy to use and made in USA. Very rugged.
customer_reviews.text: Nice American made product. Tough and durable, like all the Rubbermaid stuff used to be. Now you have to buy the commercial line to get that thick, nice plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The sponge came off after 3x use. It has no screws to hold it base even though the holes are there.
customer_reviews.author: C2

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost try it.
customer_reviews.text: I like using this - makes a quick job of mopping the kitchen floor. I like the two compartments makes it more sanitary for rinsing the mop.
customer_reviews.author: E. Solch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Like to keep soapy water and clean water separate, but both available. Perfect for cleaning chores with fewer trips to the sink or hose! Rubbermaid does it right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Double Pail Plastic Bucket, 19 Quart, Gray, FG262888GRAY
product_meta.description: Style:PailThe Rubbermaid Commercial Double Pail Plastic Bucket makes using a sponge mop simple. One side holds cleaning solution, while the other side holds clean rinse water. Made of durable plastic, this 19-quart Rubbermaid bucket will be a long-lasting solution to your mopping needs. This small bucket also includes a built-in bail handle.
feature_bullets: One side holds cleaning solution, while the other side holds clean rinse water

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
